results.text: The Internet is simply disgusting, or rather it simply does not exist, it crashes 8 times in an hour. Neither in the morning, nor in the afternoon, and even more so in the evening, it is impossible to watch something even in low quality, and in fact only 1 device is connected. Its money is not worth, from the word, at all !!!
results.title: Ayesha Silva

results.text: Absolutely don't care about people! The system for publishing reviews is disgusting. I'm tired of getting stereotyped answers and trying to defend real positive customer reviews. But fake negative ones are always on the way ...
results.title: Frances Neal

results.text: I want to thank you guys again! Everything is very clear. Satisfied satisfied and satisfied again. Previously, there were not big questions about installation and timing. We turned again. Changes in work are visible. Well done. All wishes are fulfilled. I recommend!!
results.title: Elise Mays

results.text: Cool office, not chic of course, but there are pluses in terms of comfort. Canteen in the office, table tennis, kicker, gym, shower. Cozy rooms for 12-30 people, not a solid open space. Cheese, fruits, various sweets at coffee points.
results.title: Jak Chase

results.text: I have been to this restaurant quite often, but every time something upsets me. But today, apparently, was the last straw. On previous trips, I encountered such problems as: dirty toilets (I understand that, as it should be according to the standard, it is impossible to wash the bathrooms every 15 minutes, but there was nowhere even to step there); incompetence of the staff (for example, I ordered a spicy chefburger, but they brought the original one) and much more. But today I encountered a real rudeness, moreover, from the manager. I ordered 'to go' and they brought a tray. I asked the manager if this was my order, she said yes. And attention: after I politely asked her to pack my order with me (as it should have been originally), she silently literally threw the bag into my order and left, defiantly showing that 'you collect your order.' I never write reviews, but today's case is the final nail in the coffin. By the way, I don’t know how I didn’t notice (I must have been very dumbfounded by rudeness), but, having opened my order already at home, I found that I had not yet been informed of the cheeseburger. There are no words, only emotions, and mostly negative ones. Terrible restaurant, terrible staff, terrible service. Even one star is too much for this place.
results.title: Lilian Ware

results.text: There was no one at the checkout, no one to call (but as always), I had to make an order at the terminal, coffee (latte) was not topped up about 100 mln (it’s a pity I didn’t take a photo). Arguing by the fact that .. perhaps the machine has run out of milk. Good thing they replaced it quickly.
results.title: Fergus Mendez

results.text: Good day, I was yesterday, I ordered a not very large order, I waited for 15 minutes, there were few people, the large potatoes turned out to be too large in terms of points, but they were similar in size to 2 standard, spicy strips, I don’t really like to say, but also how they wouldn’t have asked the most interesting thing, that the potatoes cost as much as half of my order, and for 4.8 r, but here’s the problem, it cost less and without sauces, I ordered sauces separately, the girls may be trying, but they need a little instruction, for now in fact, I didn’t like that I waited 15 minutes, the second, that the potato meant a whole basket, but in fact, they gave 2 standard ones for some reason, 3 for the price they didn’t say that this was a basket that costs 5p, but it cost 3 in the coupon ,9r like and with sauces, the ruble is bullshit but unpleasant
results.title: Arabella Jimenez

results.text: If it were not for the negligent attitude to work and lead time, it would be better, the food is tasty and warm, lazy employees. So hard to open on time? Well, if they opened 10 minutes later, then it’s understandable, but not to open after 40 minutes, this is already disrespectful to visitors, I would put 3, but since the food is very tasty 4. I hope you solve the problem with opening, because many like and I are traveling from afar, after the road I want to eat, but you don’t open up and thus don’t let you eat :(
results.title: Clark Weaver

results.text: As you would expect from an institution that is located near the train stations, there is a fairly colorful set of visitors. From the homeless and foul-smelling to the well-groomed who popped in for a bite to eat between flights. In fact, it is worth selecting the people who are inside. A lot of homeless inside. Uncomfortable place.
results.title: Liliana Washington

results.text: It is convenient that the cafe is located directly opposite the bus station. However, despite the fact that the KFS starts working at 07:00, it opened only at 07:10. We arrived in Minsk early and wanted to have a bite to eat, but we had to wait for some unknown reason. And it's cold outside now. After we nevertheless got inside the institution, we were immediately warned that the cheeseburger would be no earlier than in 10 minutes. We were completely satisfied with the quality of food and taste. However, there was a surprise with a visit to the toilet. To visit the restroom, you must enter the code that is indicated on the check. A real secret room. The music is playing too loud. The staff is slow. Most of all, I was outraged that the FSC did not open on time.
results.title: Katie Taylor
